column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=The only time I have ever planted a tree was as a memorial .
#text=We had raised the funds to buy the tree .
#text=Then I went to Home depot to pick out the tree .
#text=I know nothing about trees , so I had the employee at Home Depot help me .
#text=She helped me decide the best tree for the area that we were planting it .
#text=One that would n't need much work or upkeep .
#text=Then she showed me what else I would need for the tree .
#text=We went to the park where we were planting the tree and dug the hole for the tree .
#text=After we place the tree and put in the supports , we filled the hole back in , packing the soil tight .
#text=We said a few words and watered the tree .
#text=Lastly , we put the memorial plaque in front of the tree since it was a memorial for someone who has passed .
